Desc.entry: A registered charity which recruits undergraduates, graduates, postgraduates, women returners and college students doing their A Levels to work in schools in both the primary and secondary sector. Aims to raise achievement and improve numeracy and literacy levels in the minority ethnic communities and beyond through direct homework support and mentoring. Also provides study support at the weekends and activities during the holidays. Runs weekly youth projects where young people can participate in sporting activities.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 10am-4pm (office times); Sat am (youth activities and study support)

category.entry: BLACK AND MINORITY ETHNIC PEOPLE - GENERAL SUPPORT ORGANISATIONS
